text: Helmut Gille (born 23 April 1939) is a German equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:German male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of East Germany Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:People from Salzwedel
title: Helmut Gille
